column3: Budget letter request mailed to Outside Agencies.
Budget preparation instructions distributed to Department Heads
Including FY 2009 and FY 2010 Actual Expenses, FY 2011
Revised Budget and FY 2012 Request Departmental Budgets.
FY 2012 Departmental Expenditure Budget Requests due to Finance.
Advertise Pre-Budget Public Hearing on January 24, 2011.
Finance begins review of Departmental Budget Requests.
Departmental Budget hearings with City Manager and Finance Director
Final adjustments by Finance Department and City Manager to FY 2012
